description: Part first floor extension and mansard roof to existing General Industrial/Storage and Distribution unit (B2/B8 Use Class) to create 673sq.m of additional floor space for ancillary amenity, storage and office uses.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers 01/10, 06/10, 07/10, 08/10, 09/10, 10/10, received 10th of August 2016.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.

| The premises shall be used for B1/B2/B8 Uses, and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in any Class of any Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).

Reason: In order to restrict the use of the premises in the interest of the strategic function of this designated Strategic Industrial Land for small and medium businesses and of the amenities of future occupiers of any sensitive use (residential, day care, schools, hospital, care home etc.), and to ensure that the development accords with Policies 4A and 7A of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 2.17, 4.4, 7.14 and 7.15 of The London Plan (2016 as amended) and guidance within the National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no development as specified in Part 3 Classes O, P, T and V and Part 4 Classes A, B and C other than expressly authorised by this permission, shall be carried out without express planning permission first being obtained from the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: In order to restrict the use of the premises in the interest of the strategic function of this designated Strategic Industrial Land for small and medium businesses and of the amenities of future occupiers of any sensitive use (residential, day care, schools, hospital, care home etc.), and to ensure that the development accords with Policies 4A and 7A of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 2.17, 4.4, 7.14 and 7.15 of The London Plan (2016 as amended) and guidance within the National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | The proposed car parking spaces on the site related to the development hereby permitted and shown on drawing 08/10/C, including one disabled parking bay, two electric charging points, and eight additional parking spaces shall be provided prior to the first occupation of the development permitted and retained permanently.  The car parking facilities shall only be used by the users/occupiers of the development hereby permitted.

Reason: To ensure that there is adequate provision for car parking within the site and in the interest of highways safety in accordance with policies 6.11 and 6.13 of the London Plan (2016 as amended) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012).
| Cycle storage as approved shall be provided prior to the first occupation of the development permitted and retained permanently.

Reason:  In the interests of highway and pedestrian safety all in accordance with policies 1.1 (e) and 6.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy 5.16 of the London Plan (2016 as amended) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012).
